entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/VA1/OR1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.21

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 4, 06:00 UTC  -  Jul 6, 17:00 UTC

May 17, 02:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.22).
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.22).

entry.title: [EU/CA][LogsDataPlatform] - Protocol migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 14, 10:00 - 13:00 UTC

Apr 15, 01:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/06/2023 10:00 UTC
End time : 14/06/2023 13:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement :Following our continuous improvement policy, we will perfom an maintenance on LDP.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][ManagedKubernetesService] Managed nodes OS upgrades for clusters in NO DOWNTIME policy update configuration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 13, 08:30 UTC  -  Jun 15, 16:00 UTC

Apr 13, 12:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/06/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 15/06/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected but you should have enough nodes in your K8S cluster to allow a rolling upgrade of them and to absorb a rescheduling of your workload without downtime.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade all public cloud instances (a.k.a. nodes) managed by the MKS team and running in your Kubernetes clusters to upgrade them from the operating system Ubuntu 18.04.06 LTS version to the Ubuntu 22.04.02 LTS version.
Only clusters with an upgrade policy set to "NO DOWNTIME" are targeted by this maintenance.
To prevent non wanted upgrade on services configured in NO DOWNTIME mode, we leave it up to the customers more time to manage this upgrade by themselves.
But, as the Ubuntu 18.04 LTS support will be disabled on the 31/05/2023, be aware that in case of critical vulnerability, we kept the right to force upgrade impacted services to patch as soon as possible vulnerable managed control planes and nodes.

entry.title: [GRA][Public Cloud] - Cloud Databases
entry.content:
May 17, 14:41 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/05/2023 12:20 UTC
End Time : 17/05/2023 14:30 UTC
Root cause : Database migration of our workflow manager in GRA was corrupted due to a schema update.
Our technical teams redeployed it and now everything is back to normal. All impacted services are now operational.

May 17, 14:10 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/05/2023 12:20 UTC
Service impact : Any action concerning the creation/deletion/update of databases is unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS1][Public Cloud] - T02C29
entry.content:
May 15, 09:07 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : Start time : 15/05/2023 08:20 UTC
End Time : 15/05/2023 09:05 UTC
Root cause : Electrical outage on the rack
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 15, 09:00 UTC
Identified - Update : The issue as been fixed, servers are coming back gradually.

May 15, 08:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/05/2023 08:20 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts are unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
